duties_responsibilities.duty: Maximize business owners' investment in human capital through the establishment of best practices in enterprise risk management and risk mitigation strategies.
Partner with client companies to educate and influence them on matters involving the promotion of proactive risk management culture, occupational health and safety, and behavior-based safety.
Conduct root cause analysis for risk mitigation and measure, analyze, and articulate the value of risk management initiatives, practices, and policies.
Deliver successful presentations to individuals and groups at all levels of an organization.
Conduct facility, job site, and pre-construction surveys. Provide regulatory compliance and OSHA compliance consultations.
Implement driver safety, fleet safety, and loss control programs. Develop and implement return-to-work programs. Identify safety champions and develop train-the-trainer occupational safety programs.
